.. _create_giotto_polygon_object:
``create_giotto_polygon_object``
====================================

Create a giotto polygon object

Description
-----------

Create a giotto polygon object

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   create_giotto_polygon_object(
     name = "cell",
     spatVector = NULL,
     spatVectorCentroids = NULL,
     overlaps = NULL
   )
